queries.querystring: select kpi.* from dbn_dwh_kpi kpi where kpi.kpid_code='pKPI'

includeIf.querystring: select count(*) NBR,a.STATUS,a.ORGANISM,a.LATEST_CATEGORY,a.NSN FROM mrqr_assets a WHERE a.STATUS not in ('E','D') and a.LATEST_CATEGORY not in ('C4','C5','C6','C7','C8','CA') AND a.FUNCTION='pVKEYD' GROUP BY a.STATUS, a.ORGANISM, a.LATEST_CATEGORY, a.NSN

Select concat('MRN_SPE16#',a.ASSET,'#',a.ASSET) ASSET, concat('MRN_SPE01#ASSETA&arg1=',ASSET) ILIAS, concat('MRN_SPE14#',a.NSN,'#',a.NSN) NSN, PN, MFR, SERIAL, FUNCTION, DESCRIPTION, ORGANISM, MRC from mrqr_assets a WHERE a.`STATUS` not in ('E','D') and a.LATEST_CATEGORY not in ('C4','C5','C6','C7','C8','CA') AND a.function ='pVKEYD' and if('pSTATUS'='',true,a.STATUS='pSTATUS') AND if('pORGANISM'='',true,a.ORGANISM='pORGANISM') AND if('pNSN'='',true,a.NSN='pNSN') AND if('pLATEST_CATEGORY'='',true,a.LATEST_CATEGORY='pLATEST_CATEGORY')
